lines.text: What's the matter with you? A dead man can't hurt you.
It's the man who made him dead that scares me.
Do you hear what I do?
I just got an idea. Now it's a cinch that nobody knows where to find you, so I'm goin' into town to see if I can find the fellow that stole that pardon.
Are you sure it's going to be safe?
Well, I'll tell you more about that the next time I see you.
I want you to go down to the sheepherders' camp and tell Cain that she's changed her mind.
That don't sound like a good idea to me.
I know... that's why I'm sending you.
